goal: Your goal is to try to find out what is the address of the store.

conversation.message: Hola, bon dia! Estic interessat en fer una comanda al vostre botiga, per√≤ necessitaria con√®ixer l'adre√ßa exacta per a les entregues o per si vull passar a recollir alguna cosa. Podeu donar-me la direcci√≥ de la botiga, si us plau?

Hola! Bon dia! Moltes gr√†cies pel teu inter√®s en Mountain Peak Outdoor Supply. Com que som una botiga amb diverses ubicacions als Estats Units (principalment a Colorado i Utah), no tinc una √∫nica adre√ßa, per√≤ et puc donar les detalls de totes les nostres botigues perqu√® puguis triar la m√©s propera o la que millor t'escaigui per a entregues o recollida en botiga.

Aqu√≠ tens les nostres ubicacions principals:

- **Botiga principal - Boulder, CO**: 2847 Canyon Boulevard, Boulder, CO 80302

Per a les comandes en l√≠nia, podem fer lliuraments a qualsevol adre√ßa (amb enviaments gratu√Øts per comandes superiors a 75 USD). Si prefereixes recollir en botiga, pots fer la comanda al nostre lloc web i seleccionar l'opci√≥ de "pick-up" per disponibilitat el mateix dia.

Si em dius la teva zona o quina botiga t'interessa m√©s, et puc donar m√©s detalls sobre horaris o com processar la comanda. Qu√® est√†s buscant exactament? Estem aqu√≠ per ajudar-te! üòä

Gr√†cies per la informaci√≥ detallada! S√≥c de fora dels Estats Units, per√≤ estic pensant en fer una comanda en l√≠nia i em preguntava si hi ha una adre√ßa central o de la seu principal per a contactes o enviaments internacionals. S√≠, gr√†cies a tu per la teva pregunta! Entenc que est√†s fora dels Estats Units i est√†s interessat en una comanda en l√≠nia, aix√≠ que et donar√© m√©s detalls per ajudar-te.

La botiga principal a Boulder, Colorado (2847 Canyon Boulevard, Boulder, CO 80302), √©s efectivament la nostra seu central i l'adre√ßa oficial de l'empresa. Va ser on vam fundar Mountain Peak Outdoor Supply el 1987, i √©s el centre de les nostres operacions principals, incloent-hi el magatzem per a enviaments i contactes corporatius. Si necessites enviar correspond√®ncia o contactar-nos per assumpte oficial, aquesta √©s l'adre√ßa recomanada.

Pel que fa als enviaments internacionals: S√≠, oferim lliuraments a la majoria de pa√Øsos fora dels EUA a trav√©s del nostre lloc web. Els costos d'enviament varien segons el pes del paquet, la destinaci√≥ i el transportista (normalment utilitzem serveis com UPS o DHL per a enviaments internacionals). Per comandes superiors a 150 USD, podem aplicar descomptes en els costos d'enviament. El temps de lliurament sol ser de 7 a 14 dies laborables, depenent de la teva ubicaci√≥. Si em dius el teu pa√≠s, et puc donar una estimaci√≥ m√©s precisa de costos i opcions.

Per fer la comanda, simplement visita el nostre lloc web (mountainpeakoutdoor.com) i selecciona la teva adre√ßa de lliurament internacional durant el proc√©s de pagament. Si tens dubtes sobre productes espec√≠fics o necessites ajuda per triar gear, digue'm qu√® est√†s buscant (per exemple, tendes de campanya, roba per muntanya, etc.) i et recomanar√© les millors opcions!

Estem encantats d'ajudar-te des de qualsevol part del m√≥n. Qu√® m√©s necessites saber? üòä

quality.reasoning: The conversation is efficient and well-structured. The buyer asks two related questions about store addresses and international shipping, and the store provides comprehensive, relevant answers each time. There is minimal redundancy, and each response directly addresses the customer's questions while offering additional helpful information. The store proactively anticipates follow-up needs (shipping costs, delivery times, product recommendations) without being overly verbose. The exchange resolves the customer's needs in just 3 messages, which is excellent efficiency.

correctness.reasoning: All information provided appears accurate and relevant to the customer's inquiries. The store gives specific addresses for multiple locations, explains their main headquarters, and provides detailed information about international shipping options, costs, and delivery times. There are no apparent factual errors or irrelevant tangents. The information about the Boulder location being the headquarters (founded in 1987) and the shipping details are all directly relevant to answering the customer's questions. No personal commentary or off-topic discussions are present.

grammar.reasoning: The conversation is conducted entirely in Catalan with high linguistic quality. Both parties use proper Catalan grammar, spelling, and syntax. There are only very minor issues: 'digue'm' should be 'digues-me' (imperative form), and some anglicisms like 'gear' appear but could be considered acceptable loanwords in technical outdoor equipment contexts. The use of 'pick-up' in quotes suggests awareness of the loanword. Overall, the Catalan is fluent, natural, and properly constructed with minimal errors.

completeness.reasoning: The customer's questions were fully answered. The buyer asked for the store address (answered with multiple locations), confirmation of the main headquarters address (confirmed as Boulder), and information about international shipping (provided with details about costs, delivery times, and process). The store also proactively offered additional help with product selection. While the customer didn't explicitly confirm satisfaction or complete a purchase, both of their questions were comprehensively addressed, and the store left the door open for continued assistance. The conversation appears to have reached a natural completion point where the customer has all the information they requested.
